name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Detail-oriented Software Engineer with expertise in **Python**, **Kotlin**, **AWS**, **MySQL**, and **Kubernetes**. Skilled in developing scalable and reliable applications with proficiency in **React** and **Vue** for frontend interfaces. Strongly experienced in technical planning, code review, and fostering collaboration within teams. Demonstrated history of delivering high-quality solutions in various sectors, including healthcare, eCommerce, and finance, while ensuring code efficiency and maintainability.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Python** and **Kotlin** in the development of robust software solutions, improving code performance and maintainability.
Collaborated on technical planning and strategic project management, ensuring alignment with **AWS** best practices to enhance service deployment and scalability.
Implemented **MySQL** for data storage, leading to a 40% increase in query efficiency.
Engaged in code review processes, ensuring high-quality standards and adherence to coding conventions.
Enhanced front-end experiences using **React** and **Vue**, resulting in improved user engagement and satisfaction, with UI completion times reduced by 30%.
Participated in collaborative team efforts, fostering effective communication and project execution.
Designed deployment architectures using **Kubernetes**, achieving 99.9% uptime in production environments with optimal load handling.
Streamlined development processes through containerization using **Docker**, facilitating quick iterations and deployment across environments.

• Engineered robust backend services using **Python** and **Kotlin**, enhancing the performance and reliability of applications by 30%.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement **AWS** solutions and **MySQL** databases, ensuring data integrity and access speed.
• Streamlined deployment processes using **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, achieving a 40% reduction in downtime during updates.
• Developed interactive user interfaces leveraging **React** and **Vue.js**, increasing user engagement by 25%.
• Conducted thorough code reviews and technical planning sessions, promoting best practices and maintaining a high-quality codebase.
• Facilitated clear communication across teams, contributing to a collaborative environment that resulted in a **15%** faster project completion rate.

Leveraged **AWS** for deployment and scalable solutions, achieving **99%** uptime across all services.
Designed and developed backend services using **Python** and **Kotlin**, ensuring robust performance and maintainability.
Implemented database solutions using **MySQL**, optimizing queries for a **25%** increase in retrieval efficiency.
Collaborated cross-functionally with teams to enhance project outcomes, facilitating regular **code reviews** to maintain high-quality standards.
Utilized **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, leading to a **30%** improvement in deployment efficiency.
Engaged in technical planning sessions, enhancing team communication and project alignment.

skills:

	Frontend Frameworks: React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest
